passive.name: Self-Amusement
passive.description: When the wearer inflicts a debuff on an enemy, gains a stack of Trick. Every stack of Trick increases the wearer's DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, stacking up to {{2}} time(s). This effect lasts for {{3}} turn(s). When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is {{4, percent}}% or higher, increases ATK by <orangeStrong>{{5, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
